ActCanadian Energy Regulator Act
SubjectRegulations Amending Certain Regulations Made Under the National Energy Board Act
PrecisRegulations amending CERTAIN REGULATIONS MADE UNDER THE NATIONAL ENERGY BOARD ACT in order to update the schedules in regulations which contain the lists of Group 1 oil and gas companies, subject to financial regulation.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2020-0051 Publication Date: 2020-04-01
